anadrofish 2.1.0

Juvenile (hatch-to-outmigrant) survival

sim_juvenile_s.Rd

Function used to simulate juvenile (hatch-to-outmigrant) survival from daily rates of A

Usage

sim_juvenile_s(species = c("AMS", "ALE", "BBH"))

Arguments

species

Species used for simulation ("AMS", "ALE", or "BBH")

References

Crecco, V., T. Savoy, and L. Gunn. 1983. Daily mortality rates of larval and juvenile American shad (*Alosa sapidissima*) in the Connecticut River with changes in year-class strength. Canadian Journal of Fisheries and Aquatic Sciences 40:1719–1728.

Overton et al. (2012)

Stich et al. (in press)

Hook et al. (2007)

Examples

sim_juvenile_s(species = "ALE")
#> [1] 0.002263546
